text: Alfredo Álvarez Calderón (19 December 1918 - 25 February 2001) was a Peruvian diver. He competed in the men's 3 metre springboard event at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Peruvian male divers Category:Olympic divers of Peru Category:Divers at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lima
title: Alfredo Álvarez Calderón
